title: Syrian artists welcomed by Paris atelier
text:
Syrian artists welcomed by Paris atelier 8:22pm IST - 01:25 
Syrian artists fleeing the war in their home country find support from Paris-based atelier, which provides a safe space for them to carry on with their art. Zahra Mackaoui reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Syrian artists fleeing the war in their home country find support from Paris-based atelier, which provides a safe space for them to carry on with their art. Zahra Mackaoui reports.
